Class picture.directFractal.Fract1 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----picture.PicPipe
           |
           +----picture.directFractal.DirectFractal
                   |
                   +----picture.directFractal.Fract1
public class Fract1
extends DirectFractal
A simple circular fractal with many parts shaped like quarter circles. Many of the numerical constants have a suffix f because the compiler, in direct violation of the spec, assumes they are double by default.

This code is (c) 1996 Leemon Baird <leemon@cs.cmu.edu>, http://www.cs.cmu.edu/~baird
The source and object code may be redistributed freely. If the code is modified, please state so in the comments.

Version:
1.0, 28 March 96
Author:
Leemon Baird
